speaker: macbeth
dialog: You know your own degrees; sit down: at first And last the hearty welcome.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Ourself will mingle with society, And play the humble host.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Our hostess keeps her state, but in best time We will require her welcome.

speaker: lady_macbeth
dialog: Pronounce it for me, sir, to all our friends; For my heart speaks they are welcome.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: See, they encounter thee with their hearts' thanks. Both sides are even: here I'll sit i' the midst:

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Be large in mirth; anon we'll drink a measure The table round.
